Description: A glazed composition model of a tall vase: with a flat base, the sides converging at the top to a narrow mouth. The lower part of the vase was glazed green, whilst the upper part was glazed a darker colour, which has now decayed to a dark brown. A small part of the rim has been broken away.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Temple of Osiris-Khentimentu (Abydos), Chamber M69 deposit
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' II (London, 1902-4), 26 and pl. VII, 108.
